examples: They called for assurances that the government is committed to its education policy.
Pidieron garantías de que el gobierno está comprometido con su política educativa.
Unemployment seems to be rising, despite repeated assurances to the contrary.
El desempleo parece estar aumentando, a pesar de las reiteradas garantías de lo contrario.
There was an air of easy assurance about him.
Había un aire de tranquilidad en él.
It was good to see some of her old assurance coming back.
Fue bueno ver recuperar algo de su antigua seguridad.
